name: Adobe Device Central Project File
summary: Learn about .ADCP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Adobe Device Central projects allow developers to consolidate information about devices for which they are creating Flash content.
NOTE: Adobe Device Central was discontinued in 2012.

description: Project file created by Adobe Device Central, a program used for developing Flash content for mobile devices; contains a list of target devices (e.g., Sony Ericsson, Samsung, BlackBerry, LG, Nokia, etc.) as well as Flash files used for deploying applications to the devices.
